The best hotels of 2016

All hotel guests who have stayed in a hotel via the booking website Hotels.nl are given the chance to review their experience of the hotel. Over 43,000 reviews were written in 2016. The review score of each hotel is listed right next to it on Hotels.nl. Guests can give a score in five different categories: price/quality, hygiene, service, comfort, and location. The review score as well as the pros and cons written by guests, help future guests in deciding which hotel to book.

Hotels.nl handed out awards for the first time in 2014. The hoteliers responded enthusiastically, which is why this year the awards were once more handed out by Hotels.nl employees in person.

With an impressive average review score of 9, based on 180 reviews, Van der Valk Nijmegen-Lent was voted the best hotel in the Netherlands by Hotels.nl guests.

This year, for the first time, Hotels.nl has handed out the award for Best Chain for the hotel chain that excels when it comes to beautiful locations, a good price/quality ratio, and excellent review scores. The winner of 2016 is NH Hotels!
